name: SuperheroesHub
0:
”Alexa, open Superheroes Hub”
”Tell me about Iron Man”
”Give me a fact on Iron Man”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: superheroes hub
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is designed to provide you with interesting facts and information about your favorite marvel characters. You can ask "Tell me about Iron Man" (Tell me about {marvel character}) to get a brief bio about the Superhero. 

You can also say, "Give me a fact about Iron Man" to know an interesting fact about the Superhero. 

Everyday the list of characters in this app is increasing and we are adding more and more features everyday! The facts are updated on a daily basis to make sure you are up to date with your favorite Superhero. Start your Marvel journey with this Alexa skill and show off your knowledge in front of your friends and family.

---
This skill is in no way associated with Marvel, Marvel Comics, Marvel Studios and Marvel Cinematic Universe. All the characters and their details are the copyrights of their respective creators and copyright holders. We do not claim to own any characters.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
